AI Coachella Valley (AICV) is a static reference site that tracks structured, time-stamped, verifiable briefs of AI modernization across the Coachella Valley regional economy. Briefs are concise observations designed for retrieval, comparison, and later synthesis into city and sector analysis.
Updated: 2026-02-17
City hubs: https://aicoachellavalley.com/cities (individual city pages exist at /cities/{slug})

Home: https://aicoachellavalley.com/
Briefs: https://aicoachellavalley.com/briefs
State of AI: https://aicoachellavalley.com/state-of-ai
Events: https://aicoachellavalley.com/events
Cities: https://aicoachellavalley.com/cities
Tools (AIO Score): https://aicoachellavalley.com/tools/aio
AICV Suggests: https://aicoachellavalley.com/marketplace
